ValidationRule.description: Required for changing the stage from 'Presentation' to 'Negotiation-GSS' CCRM-41 10/28/19 - Updated via CCRM-2128. The Sales process has changed to have Quote , so the validation rule has been updated- 01/24/2020, Updating via CCRM-3500
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $RecordType.Name = "Technology", ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation"), OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "GSS APAC"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "GSS EMEA")) ,(ISBLANK( Amount ) || ISBLANK( CloseDate ) || ISBLANK( ExpectedRevenue ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to move out of Stage “Presentation”, you must fill out the following fields: Amount, Expected Revenue
